sentences.sContent: International safeguards prevent the increase of nuclear weapons.
sentences.sCn: 国际安全条约防止核武器数量增加。

sentences.sContent: safeguards against the exploitation of children
sentences.sCn: 避免儿童遭受剥削的保护措施

remMethod.val: safe(安全) ＋ guard(保卫) → 保护； 宝洁公司出品的舒肤佳系列就是Safeguard

trans.tranOther: a rule, agreement etc that is intended to protect someone or something from possible dangers or problems
